main event: A bright white object, brighter than the first magnitude star, was observed in the sky on 30 July 1962.
interesting points: The object was positioned at 34-15N 153-28E over the Pacific Ocean., The object had a maximum altitude of approximately 80 degrees., It was heading ESE and had an observed speed of 10 +/- 1,750., The object disappeared bearing 105 degrees at approximately 30 degrees altitude., The sky was clear during the observation.
